title: Bubble Launcher - Android Wear
summary: The first animated and intelligent app launcher for your Android Wear smartwatch
developerAddress:
Wearable Software
Cedric Larrat
Grötzingerstr. 73
76227 Karlsruhe-Durlach
description: Bubble Launcher for Android Wear is the first animated and intelligent app launcher for your Android Wear smartwatch. Open watch apps quickly via animated launcher on left side of the screen. Apps are shown as bubbles and are sorted automatically by usage. Use the build in window manager to switch between opened apps. Use the settings button on head of the laucher screen to quick access the settings menu for your wearable.Get more apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxsFeatures:★ Open apps quickly★ Animated bubble app list★ Switch between opened apps★ Battery displayPlease note:-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear app.Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.Instructions:1.) First of all you have to activate the bubble launcher with the settings app on wear device. To start the app just say: "Ok Google... start Bubble Launcher" or press the main screen and select Bubble Launcher. Press the checkbox to activate the launcher. Swipe to right to close the settings app. 2.) Swipe to right from the top left corner of the screen for square wear devices and from the left center for round wear devices to open the launcher. Swipe to left from the right side to close the launcher. To open an app just click on the appropriate icon. The more you use an app, the higher it appears in the list. Long press on an app entry to show the app title.3.) On head of the launcher screen you will get quick access to the wearable settings app and a build in window manager. With the window manager it is possible to see which apps are opened. Press on an entry to bring the app in front of the screen.
descriptionHTML:
Bubble Launcher for Android Wear is the first animated and intelligent app launcher for your Android Wear smartwatch. Open watch apps quickly via animated launcher on left side of the screen. Apps are shown as bubbles and are sorted automatically by usage. Use the build in window manager to switch between opened apps. Use the settings button on head of the laucher screen to quick access the settings menu for your wearable.


Get more apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Features:
★ Open apps quickly
★ Animated bubble app list
★ Switch between opened apps
★ Battery display


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear app.


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.


Instructions:


1.) First of all you have to activate the bubble launcher with the settings app on wear device. To start the app just say: "Ok Google... start Bubble Launcher" or press the main screen and select Bubble Launcher. Press the checkbox to activate the launcher. Swipe to right to close the settings app.


2.) Swipe to right from the top left corner of the screen for square wear devices and from the left center for round wear devices to open the launcher. Swipe to left from the right side to close the launcher. To open an app just click on the appropriate icon. The more you use an app, the higher it appears in the list. Long press on an app entry to show the app title.


3.) On head of the launcher screen you will get quick access to the wearable settings app and a build in window manager. With the window manager it is possible to see which apps are opened. Press on an entry to bring the app in front of the screen.
comments: Great concept, lots of room for potential! First off, I love that it doesn't take over my watch face choice or anything else. It just adds an app drawer that you open by swiping from the left which did nothing before.  I hope to see the UI work much more smoothly & responsive in the upcoming updates, and perhaps some customization options after that: such as icon size, options for number of columns, show/hide app titles, maybe make the top bar scrollable & customizable with favorite apps? It's a great app! Looking forward to what's to come!

Using for 3 days now; would be great to be able to configure what icons are displayed. Also it would be great to have a timeout feature, so the launcher hides after a configurable duration of inactivity. Found that any other apps that require swiping from the left of the screen conflicts with bubble launcher, would be great if this could detect if another app is open and disable itself.

Swiping is difficult and doesn't close quickly Takes at least 3 swipes to open the drawer. Same thing with closing the drawer. Clicking the side button puts the watch in ambient mode, but the launcher stays open. So, there's no way of escaping the tedious process of selecting the exact, small region for xlosing the drawer.

Top right blue /white settings gear wheel icon not work. Top centre double white square busts gives a grey screen. Unable to find location despite android location set to on ..GPS+wifi. I hope there is an update soon as I bought licence. Sent two emails requesting assistance but no replies!

Dirty liars!!! I hate apps who LIE to their customers. They didn't mention anywhere about it being a trial version or that you have to buy anything, but after a couple days of use the app stops working and requires your to buy it to continue using it. Stay off these dirty liars!
So how do I purchase the full app? And explain properly, not just it's in the app. You clearly are not concerned with customer care are you? We are just after a clear way of purchasing your product?
recentChanges: - Fixed issues with window manager in Android 5.1.1
- Long press on an app in launcher to show app title
